register.name: CONTROL
register.description: Provides control and configuration information for: - memory alignment, endianness, protection, and fault behavior - MPU and cache enables and cache replacement strategy - interrupts and the behavior of interrupt latency - the location for exception vectors - program flow prediction

bitField.name: IE
bitField.description: Identifies little or big instruction endianness in use

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: Determines the state of the CPSR E bit on an exception

bitField.name: DZ
bitField.description: Enable generation of undefined instruction exception on divide by zero

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Controls replacement strategy for instruction and data caches

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Determines the location of exception vectors

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Enables strict alignment of data to detect alignment faults in data accesses

register.name: AUXILIARY_CONTROL
register.description: The Auxiliary Control Registers control: - branch prediction - performance features - error and parity logic

bitField.name: B1TCMPCEN
bitField.description: B1TCM parity or ECC check enable

bitField.name: B0TCMPCEN
bitField.description: B0TCM parity or ECC check enable

bitField.name: ATCMPCEN
bitField.description: ATCM parity or ECC check enable

bitField.name: AXISCEN
bitField.description: AXI slave cache RAM access enable

bitField.name: AXISCUEN
bitField.description: AXI slave cache RAM non-privileged access enable

bitField.name: DILSM
bitField.description: Disable Low Interrupt Latency (LIL) on load/store multiples

bitField.name: BP
bitField.description: This field controls the branch prediction policy

bitField.name: DBWR
bitField.description: Disable write burst in the AXI master

bitField.name: DLFO
bitField.description: Disable linefill optimization in the AXI master

bitField.name: ERPEG
bitField.description: Enable random parity error generation in the cache RAMs

bitField.name: DNCH
bitField.description: Disable data forwarding for Non-cacheable accesses in the AXI master

bitField.name: FORA
bitField.description: Force outer read allocate (ORA) for outer write allocate (OWA) regions

bitField.name: FDSNS
bitField.description: Force D-side to not-shared when MPU is off

bitField.name: SMOV
bitField.description: sMOV of a divide does not complete out of order

bitField.name: DILS
bitField.description: Disable low interrupt latency on all load/store instructions

bitField.name: CEC
bitField.description: Cache error control for cache parity and ECC errors

register.name: SECONDARY_AUXILIARY_CONTROL
register.description: The Auxiliary Control Registers control: - branch prediction - performance features - error and parity logic

bitField.name: DCHE
bitField.description: Disable hard-error support in the caches

bitField.name: DR2B
bitField.description: Enable random 2-bit error generation in cache RAMs

bitField.name: DOODPFP
bitField.description: Out-of-order Double Precision Floating Point instruction control

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Floating-point invalid operation exception output mask

bitField.name: IDC
bitField.description: Floating-point input denormal exception output mask

bitField.name: B0TCMECC
bitField.description: Correction for internal ECC logic on BTCM ports

bitField.name: ATCMECC
bitField.description: Correction for internal ECC logic on ATCM port

register.name: COPROCESSOR_ACCESS_CONTROL
register.description: Sets access rights for coprocessors CP0-CP13

register.name: IRQ_ENABLE
register.description: Enables any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, to generate an interrupt request on overflow

register.name: FIQ_ENABLE
register.description: Enables any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, to generate an fast interrupt request on overflow

register.name: RESET_ENABLE
register.description: Enables any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, to generate a reset request on overflow

register.name: DBG_REQ_ENABLE
register.description: Enables any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, to generate a debug request on overflow

register.name: IRQ_ENABLE_CLEAR
register.description: Disables overflow IRQ requests from any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, for which they have been enabled

register.name: FIQ_ENABLE_CLEAR
register.description: Disables overflow FIQ requests from any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, that are enabled

register.name: RESET_ENABLE_CLEAR
register.description: Disables overflow reset requests from any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, that are enabled

register.name: DBG_REQ_ENABLE_CLEAR
register.description: Disables overflow debug requests from any of the PMC Registers, PMC0-PMC2, and CCNT, that are enabled

register.name: MPU_REGION_NUMBER
register.description: This register determines which of the multiple MPU region registers is accessed

bitField.name: Region
bitField.description: Defines the group of registers to be accessed

register.name: MPU_REGION_BASE
register.description: The MPU Region Base Address Registers describe the base address of the region specified by the Memory Region Number Register

bitField.name: BASE_ADDRESS
bitField.description: Physical base address of a region

register.name: MPU_REGION_SIZE_EN
register.description: The MPU Region Size and Enable Registers: - specify the size of the region specified by the Memory Region Number Register - identify the address ranges that are used for a particular region - enable or disable the region, and its sub -regions, specified by the Memory Region Number Register

bitField.name: ENABLE
bitField.description: Enables or disables a memory region

register.name: MPU_REGION_ACCESS_CONTROL
register.description: The MPU Region Access Control Registers hold the region attributes and access permissions for the region specified by the Memory Region Number Register

register.name: ID
register.description: The Main ID Register returns the device ID code that contains information about the processor

bitField.name: VARIANT
bitField.description: Identifies the major revision of the processor

bitField.name: REVISION
bitField.description: Identifies the minor revision of the processor

register.name: MPU_TYPE
register.description: The MPU Type Register holds the value for the number of instruction and data memory regions implemented in the processor

bitField.name: DREGION
bitField.description: Specifies the number of unified MPU regions

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies the type of MPU regions, unified or separate, in the processor

register.name: MULTIPROCESSOR_ID
register.description: Enables CPUs to be recognized and characterized within a multi-processor system.

register.name: ID_PFR0
register.description: Provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: STATE3
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb Execution Environment

bitField.name: STATE2
bitField.description: Indicates support for acceleration of execution environments in hardware or software

bitField.name: STATE1
bitField.description: Indicates type of Thumb encoding that the processor supports

bitField.name: STATE0
bitField.description: Indicates support for ARM instruction set

register.name: ID_PFR1
register.description: The Processor Feature Register 1 provides information about the execution state support and programmer model for the processor

bitField.name: MICRO_PMODEL
bitField.description: Indicates support for Microcontroller programmer model

bitField.name: SEC_EXTENSION
bitField.description: Indicates support for Security Extensions Architecture

bitField.name: ARMV4_PMODEL
bitField.description: Indicates support for standard ARMv4 programmer model

register.name: ID_DFR0
register.description: Provides information about the debug system for the processor

bitField.name: MDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates support for the microcontroller debug model - memory mapped

bitField.name: TDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates support for the trace debug model - memory mapped

bitField.name: TDM_C
bitField.description: Indicates support for the trace debug model - coprocessor

bitField.name: CDM_MM
bitField.description: Indicates the type of embedded processor debug model that the processor supports

bitField.name: SDM
bitField.description: Indicates the type of secure debug model that the processor supports

bitField.name: CDM_C
bitField.description: Indicates the type of applications processor debug model that the processor supports

register.name: ID_AFR0
register.description: Provides additional information about the features of the processor

register.name: ID_MMFR0
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support operations of the processor

bitField.name: FCSE
bitField.description: Indicates support for Fast Context Switch Extension

bitField.name: AUXCON
bitField.description: Indicates support for the auxiliary registers

bitField.name: TCM
bitField.description: Indicates support for TCM and associated DMA

bitField.name: OUT_SHARE
bitField.description: Indicates support for the Outer shareable attribute

bitField.name: CACHE_CO
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache coherency maintenance

bitField.name: PMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Physical Memory System Architecture

bitField.name: VMSA
bitField.description: Indicates support for Virtual Memory System Architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR1
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support of the processor

bitField.name: L1_TEST_CLEAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for test and clean operations on data cache, Harvard or unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache, entire cache maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_SW_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by Set and Way, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by address, unified architecture

bitField.name: L1_CLMO_MVA_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for L1 cache line maintenance operations by address, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR2
register.description: Provides information about the memory model, memory management, and cache support operations of the processor

bitField.name: HAF
bitField.description: Indicates support for Hardware Access Flag

bitField.name: MB
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory barrier operations

bitField.name: TLB_MO_U
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, unified architecture

bitField.name: TLB_MO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for TLB maintenance operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_CMRO_H
bitField.description: Indicates support for cache maintenance range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_BPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for background prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

bitField.name: L1_FPCO
bitField.description: Indicates support for foreground prefetch cache range operations, Harvard architecture

register.name: ID_MMFR3
register.description: Provides information about the two cache line maintenance operations for the processor

bitField.name: BPMO
bitField.description: Indicates support for branch predictor maintenance operations in systems with hierarchical cache maintenance operations

bitField.name: HCMO_SW
bitField.description: Indicates support for hierarchical cache maintenance operations by Set and Way

bitField.name: ID_MMFR3_HCMO_MVA
bitField.description: Indicates support for hierarchical cache maintenance operations by address

register.name: ID_ISAR0
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: COPROCESSOR
bitField.description: Indicates support for coprocessor instructions other than separately attributed feature registers, such as CP15 registers and VFP

bitField.name: CMP_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for combined compare and branch instructions

bitField.name: BIT_COUNT
bitField.description: Indicates support for bit counting instructions

bitField.name: ATOMIC
bitField.description: Indicates support for atomic load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR1
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: IF_THEN
bitField.description: Indicates support for if then instructions

bitField.name: EXTEND
bitField.description: Indicates support for sign or zero extend instructions

bitField.name: ENDIAN
bitField.description: Indicates support for endianness control instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR2
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: U_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced unsigned multiply instructions

bitField.name: S_MULTIPLY
bitField.description: Indicates support for advanced signed multiply instructions

bitField.name: INTERRUPT
bitField.description: Indicates support for multi-access interruptible instructions

bitField.name: MEM_HINT
bitField.description: Indicates support for memory hint instructions

bitField.name: LOAD_STORE
bitField.description: Indicates support for additional load and store instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR3
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: THUMBEE
bitField.description: Indicates support for ThumbEE Execution Environment extension

bitField.name: TRUE_NOP
bitField.description: Indicates support for true NOP instructions

bitField.name: THUMB_COPY
bitField.description: Indicates support for Thumb copy instructions

bitField.name: TAB_BRANCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for table branch instructions

bitField.name: SYNCH
bitField.description: Indicates support for synchronization primitive instructions

bitField.name: SVC
bitField.description: Indicates support for SVC (formerly SWI) instructions

bitField.name: SIMD
bitField.description: Indicates support for Single Instruction Multiple Data (SIMD) instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR4
register.description: Provides information about the instruction set that the processor supports beyond the basic set

bitField.name: SMC
bitField.description: Indicates support for Secure Monitor Call (SMC) (formerly SMI) instructions

register.name: ID_ISAR5
register.description: Provide additional information about the properties of the processor

register.name: ID_FCSE_PID
register.description: This register is not supported

register.name: CTX_ID
register.description: The Context ID Register holds a process IDentification (ID) value for the currently-running process

register.name: TPID_RW
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS

register.name: TPID_RO
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS

register.name: TPID_PO
register.description: The Thread and Process ID Registers provide locations to store software thread and process IDs for the OS
